Version.Comment: Contains the most recent version of the CDB Navigation Data build from Jeppesen sources.
A region of the world that is modelled with a combination of datasets available with version 3.2 of the Specification.
Another region of the world that does not intersect with region 1.
A library of geotypical and moving models in CDB 3.2 format.
Contains extensions to the CDB made by a vendor named Acme. Intended to support function X of the Acme client-device.
This is a Worldwide Database (WWDB) in CDB 3.0 format available from Presagis @ http://www.presagis.com/
A librarys of geotypical and moving models in CDB 3.0 format.
